Context:
The Ontario College Advanced (three-year) diploma graduates in certain programs may be eligible to apply for the Honours Bachelor of Technology (Construction Management) bridging program at George Brown College. Eligible applicants can attend information sessions hosted by the Centre for Construction & Engineering Technologies (CCET) to learn more about the program. To apply, individuals should use the Ontario Colleges Application Service - OCAS and select a degree program code corresponding to their three-year diploma. Accepted applicants will receive a package confirming acceptance into the program. Conditional offers may be granted for those who have not yet completed their diploma requirements.

Programs: Ontario College Advanced (three-year) diplomas in specific programs
Institution: George Brown College
Bridging Program: Honours Bachelor of Technology (Construction Management)
Application Service: Ontario Colleges Application Service - OCAS
Contact Information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
Website: https://www.georgebrown.ca/social-media-hub/ (Visit Our Social Media Hub)

Please note that this information is subject to change without notice and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
